subject: UI tests in Eclipse on MAC
msgSnippet: Is there anything special/different that needs to be done when running UI tests in Eclipse with JUnit on Mac/OSX?  I have issues with the frame tested not
messageBody:
Is there anything special/different that needs to be done when running UI tests in Eclipse with JUnit on Mac/OSX? I have issues with the frame tested not being shown (when run as a JUnit test but it does otherwise) and errors like this...

2011-08-23 16:37:37.686 java[87274:10c03] *** -[NSConditionLock
unlock]: lock (<NSConditionLock: 0x1006a5b90> '(null)') unlocked when
not locked
2011-08-23 16:37:37.686 java[87274:10c03] *** Break on _NSLockError() to debug.
